newsitem.title: USA: Frisch's holders seek Ok to raise stake.
newsitem.headline: Frisch's holders seek Ok to raise stake.

text.p: A group including Los Angeles investor Benjamin Nazarian said Monday it holds 601,551 shares or an 8.4 percent stake in Frisch's Restaurants Inc. and wants the option to acquire more than a 10 percent stake.

In a filing with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said it has asked the Cincinnati-based company's board to approve its request to increase its stake above 10 percent. The group said it currently does not have any plans to raise its holdings to that level but wants the option to do so in the future.
The group most recently bought 46,400 shares at $14.56 to $15.73 each between May 16 and June 6, according to the SEC filing.
